title: Process a Project Change Order
description: During construction of a new building, an unexpected issue requires a change order to the original contract.

tasks.description: Receive the change order request from the contractor, including the reason and cost impact.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project manager receives the formal change order request.

tasks.description: Review the change order for validity and reasonableness.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project manager reviews the request and agrees that it is necessary.

tasks.description: Approve the change order, which updates the project budget and contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project manager approves the change, and the system updates the project's financials.
